text: Pareiorhina pelicicei is a species of cascudinho (catfish) endemic to Brazil where it is known from Córrego Tamborete, in Rio Grande basin in the State of Minas Gerais of southeastern Brazil. The specific name is an honor to ichthyologist Fernando Mayer Pelicice. ==References== Category:Loricariidae Category:Fish of South America Category:Fish of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Fish described in 2015
title: Pareiorhina pelicicei
